edge: Abhay Deol plays the character of Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh in the movie.
Manjot Singh portrays the younger version of Abhay Deol's character Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh.
Paresh Rawal essays the role of Jani Singh in the movie.
In his triple role, Paresh Rawal also portrays the character of Gogi Arora in the movie.
Another character played by Paresh Rawal in his triple role is Dr. B. D. Handa.
Neetu Chandra acts as Sonal in the movie.
Manu Rishi appears as Bangali in the film.
In the movie, Richa Chadha essays the character of Dolly.
Archana Puran Singh portrays Kamlesh Handa in the film.
Anurag Arora appears as both Inspector Devender Singh and Yuvraj in the movie.
